alert.note: Alert for Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 1:30PM CDT until May 13 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lee County in eastern Arkansas... Northwestern Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Brickeys, or 8 miles east of Marianna, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brickeys, Jeffersonville, Raggio, Cody, Gassett, Kokomo, Haleside, Dansby, Soudan, Peters, Council, Diamond Woods, Ball Point, Whitehall, Tongin and Mississippi River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
